data: Upon a certain evening in the month of December, of the year one thousand six hundred and thirty-two, a man walked at a rapid pace down the Rue Saint-Honoré and directed his steps towards the Rue Bourdonnais.
Kock, Paul de, 1793-1871; Norris, Edith Mary, 1858- [Translator]
